DOC.brief_summary: The study hypothesis placement LAMS plus overlap double pigtail stent endoscopic transmural drainage PFCs solid debris result improved drainage require few endoscopic intervention compare placement LAMS alone .
DOC.brief_title: Lumen Apposing Metal Stents v Lumen Apposing Metal Stent Plus Double Pigtail Stent Endoscopic Drainage Pancreatic Fluid Collections
DOC.criteria: Male Female patient age 18 80 Must present symptomatic pancreatic fluid collection Scheduled undergo endoscopic ultrasound ( EUS ) guide drainage PFCs LAMS placement Vanderbilt Medical Center part routine care Willing able give inform consent Unwilling/unable give inform consent Patients PFCs consist < 30 % solid component assess time EUS
